name: Et-woo-product-price
author: easytech.vn

sections.description:
If customers are familiar with your website, they don’t want to explore all your page to select products they want, they need a tool help them to order products quickly. This plugin is designed to solve this problem.

This plugin will help us show list of product which are stored in Woocommerce, in a new page. People easily have a quick look to all products. These product are divided in groups of categories.
Customers can order products on this page as well. They can enter the number of products to add to cart.
This plugin also helps vendor to print this price list with header, logo, and date.
Facebook chat is also added to this page. Read more tutorial at: http://easytech.vn/how-to-add-facebook-customer-chat-to-et-woo-product-price-plugin to set up facebook chat.
sections.installation:
1. Upload “et-woo-product-price.zip” to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
  3. Add new page and choose productprice template.
  4. Add menu to this page.
  5. In admin site, link to ET woo product price, fill in the missing option.

  6. Link how to get facebook chat: http://easytech.vn/how-to-add-facebook-customer-chat-to-et-woo-product-price-plugin/
    You can also:

  7. Navigate to “Plugins” > “Add New”.

  8. Browse and search for plugins “Et-woo-product-price”
  9. Click on “Install Now” button
  10. Click “Activate” to activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
Does the woocommerce plugin is required?

Yes. Woocommerce is required for Et-woo-product-price plugin.

Will it be free forever?

Yes

Do I have to Manual config on facebook fanpage?

Yes, you must config on your fanpage and get code to add to facebook_chat option on admin site.
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • add admin option for change Product Price Header and logo
  • add code and tutorial for add facebook chat= 1.1 =
  • create product price page

short_description: Plugin create a template to show product name, product image and product price.
